page.title: 11POPULATION
page.content: Hilltown functions as a small service centre and has recently become attractive for housing development.The population has grown from seven hundred and ninety nine in 1976 to nine hundred and thirteen in 1985.Since 1976 Ardmore Park was built.It consists of about twenty to thirty houses and it is nearly all families who live there.Up the Newry road a private estate has been built.It is called Oakridge Avenue.There are 7 houses and again it is nearly all families who live there.Now and again some private houses have been built especially in Leitrim which is the area where I live.In Hilltown the population the population increases from 20 to 30 each year.This includes people coming from Cabra,Mayobridge,Rathfriland and Newry. BY CARMEL DEVLIN
